document_data.name: Bruk
document_data.mainbody: '''Bruk''' was a [[human]] [[invocation]] [[wizard]] and [[adventurer]] of the [[Puppetmasters]] company in [[1369 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Bruk considered himself superior to others by virtue of his [[Zhent]]ish heritage, and regarded everyone around himself with a measure of contempt. Despite his poor personality, he was actually quite clever and intelligent.
document_data.Possessions: Bruk wielded a ''[[staff of striking]]'' and a ''[[wand of fire]]''. He defended himself with a ''+4 [[cloak of protection]]'', a ''[[ring of mind shielding]]'', and ''[[bracers of defense]]''.
document_data.Abilities: Bruk specialized in invocation, and as such had learned many destructive blasting spells alongside his more typical arcane repertoire. His more powerful spells included ''[[fireball]]'', ''[[lightning bolt]]'', ''[[ice storm]]'', and ''[[shout]]''.
document_data.History:
Bruk was a mage of [[Zhentil Keep]] who fled when it was razed in early [[1369 DR]], then joined the Puppetmasters.

Later that year, the Puppetmasters came up with a scheme to win an easy prize for the company. They planted a letter and treasure map leading to the dungeon of [[Barrenstone]], allowing another adventuring group to excavate and clear out the complex. When they emerged from the dungeon with the treasure, the Puppetmasters attempted to rob their victims, only to be driven off and receive nothing for their troubles.
